text.text_translated:
An asteroid is a big rock in space.

There is another idea to protect Earth. An asteroid could hit our planet. The idea is to use a special, very strong bomb. This bomb can blow up the asteroid. This sounds like an idea from a movie. The movie Armageddon was about this.

But it is a real idea from NASA. It is a plan with a long name. The name is Hypervelocity Asteroid Mitigation Mission for Emergency Response (HAMMER). They would send eight-ton rockets to the asteroid. They hope to hit the asteroid. This will push it onto a new path.

But sometimes the asteroid is very near Earth. Then this plan will not work. So the rockets will carry special, very strong bombs. They will use these bombs to blow up the asteroid.
